price: (Ky është) premtimi i Allahut, e Allahu nuk e thyen premtimin e vet, por shumica e njerëzve nuk e dinë.
arabic: وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِۖ لَا يُخۡلِفُ ٱللَّهُ وَعۡدَهُۥ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: waʿda al-lahi lā yukh'lifu al-lahu waʿdahu walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
